action.primary: Tonifies Kidney Yang and treats impotence

indications: Impotence, urinary incontinence wheezing from Deficiency

action.primary: Regulates Qi and Blood and promotes labor

indications: Bleeding and pain from Blood Stasis
Swelling due to sores and boils

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Yin Deficiency.
Contraindicated for those with Heat signs.
Contraindicated for those with renal insufficiency.
Not recommended for those with weak digestion.
Not recommended for those with an Exterior condition.

useCases: Urinary frequency at night and vaginal discharge from Kidney Yang Deficiency
Susceptibility to infections in children with weak constitutions

notes: This herb can be used as a substitute for Gecko #{GeJie} Ge Jie.
The androgen content of this herb is less than Fr. Cnidii #{SheChuangZi} She Chuang Zi, but is stronger than Gecko Ge Jie.
This herb has one-half the effect of Syngnathus #{HaiLong} Hai Long which is much bigger and with a longer body and a straight tail which does not curve.
Wine-prepared Sea Horse Jiu Zhi Hai Ma is soaked in yellow rice wine. which reduces any objectionable taste and enhances its ability to tonifies the Kidneys and fortify Yang.
